title: OpenGPG
extract: OpenPGP is a standard of PGP that is open-source for public use. The term "OpenPGP" can be used to describe any program that supports the OpenPGP system.
extract_html: OpenPGP is a standard of PGP that is open-source for public use. The term "OpenPGP" can be used to describe any program that supports the OpenPGP system.
